description.en:
Ham the Astrochimp ($HAM) is a decentralized memecoin paying tribute to the first ape in space, HAM. Launched on June 20th, 2023, with a total token supply of 10 million, $HAM aims to honor the incredible achievement of our beloved space pioneer, Ham the Astrochimp.

As a fully decentralized memecoin, $HAM has a no transaction tax, its liquidity is locked for a period of six months and the contract is renounced, eliminating any room for malicious threats or back-door scams.

The goal of $HAM is not only to pay homage to history but to also use memes as a powerful tool that unifies and connects the memecoin space.
